## Exercise

`convert()` function

```{julia}
#| output: false
days = 365
```

```{julia}
days_float = convert(Float64, days) # Convert to Float64
```

```{julia}
days == days_float 
```

```{julia}
@assert days == 365
@assert days_float == 365.0
```

```{julia}
#| eval: false
convert(Int64, "1") # Error
```

```{julia}
parse(Int64, "1")
```
